column4: ...and the niggers want to take over the world for the niggers and all their benefits systems..  You talking about welfare here?  Corporate welfare is the real problem, social welfare is miniscule comparatively.  Racists are easily confused by the papers.
Yep, 'cause we don't fund education here in the US, so people have no choice.  You see what you want to see anyway.  Most people on welfare work full time, btw.
You are completely delusional, but I know enough to know you won't change by me telling you that.
